title: Brainstorming
details: Unleash creative ideas and build on them with the help of sticky notes, images, mind maps, videos, drawing capabilities â€” the list goes on.

title: Diagramming
details: Create diagrams to represent information visually, including flowcharts, UML diagrams, network diagrams, and more.

title: Meetings & Workspace
details: Create collaborative spaces where teams can meet, discuss ideas, share documents, and work together efficiently.

title: Scrum Events
details: Organize and manage your scrum events, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives.

title: Mapping
details: Visualize concepts, relationships, processes, and data using various mapping techniques such as mind mapping, concept mapping, and flowcharts.

title: Research & Design
details: Conduct research, gather insights, and create designs collaboratively, integrating feedback and iterating on solutions.

title: Strategic Planning
details: Plan and strategize for the future, set goals, allocate resources, and track progress towards achieving objectives.
